property.name: kdc_type
property.description: The type of KDC being used. Either mit-kdc or active-directory

property.name: manage_identities
property.description: Indicates whether the Ambari user and service Kerberos identities (principals and keytab files) should be managed (created, deleted, updated, etc...) by Ambari or managed manually.

property.name: install_packages
property.description: Indicates whether Ambari should install the Kerberos client package(s) or not. If not, it is expected that Kerberos utility programs (such as kadmin, kinit, klist, and kdestroy) are compatible with MIT Kerberos 5 version 1.10.3 in command line options and behaviors.

property.name: ldap_url
property.description: The URL to the Active Directory LDAP Interface

property.name: container_dn
property.description: The distinguished name (DN) of the container used store service principals

property.name: encryption_types
property.description: The supported list of session key encryption types that should be returned by the KDC.

property.name: realm
property.description: The default realm to use when creating service principals

property.name: kdc_host
property.description: The IP address or FQDN for the KDC host. Optionally a port number may be included.

property.name: admin_server_host
property.description: The IP address or FQDN for the KDC Kerberos administrative host. Optionally a port number may be included.

property.name: executable_search_paths
property.description: A comma-delimited list of search paths to use to find Kerberos utilities like kadmin and kinit.

property.name: password_length
property.description: The length required length for generated passwords.

property.name: password_min_lowercase_letters
property.description: The minimum number of lowercase letters (a-z) required in generated passwords

property.name: password_min_uppercase_letters
property.description: The minimum number of uppercase letters (A-Z) required in generated passwords

property.name: password_min_digits
property.description: The minimum number of digits (0-9) required in generated passwords

property.name: password_min_punctuation
property.description: The minimum number of punctuation characters (?.!$%^*()-_+=~) required in generated passwords

property.name: password_min_whitespace
property.description: The minimum number of whitespace characters required in generated passwords

property.name: service_check_principal_name
property.description: The principal name to use when executing the Kerberos service check

property.name: case_insensitive_username_rules
property.description: Force principal names to resolve to lowercase local usernames in auth-to-local rules

property.name: create_attributes_template
property.description: A Velocity template to use to generate a JSON-formatted document containing the set of attribute names and values needed to create a new Kerberos identity in the relevant KDC. Variables include: principal_name, principal_primary, principal_instance, realm, realm_lowercase, normalized_principal, principal digest, password, is_service, container_dn
